title: Lucianne Goldberg, Who Helped Expose Clinton Affair, Dies at 87
description: It was Ms. Goldberg, a literary agent, who suggested that Linda Tripp tape her conversations with Monica Lewinsky. She later fed revelations to the news media.
dc:creator: Anita Gates
media:description: Lucianne Goldberg in 1971.She dealt with a number of high-profile clients over the years, but it was the Bill Clinton scandal that guaranteed her place in history.
